full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 807 Filed 08/07/25 Page 1 of 1 UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. GHISLAINE MAXWELL, Defendant. ORDER GRANTING MOTION TO WITHDRAW Upon consideration of the Motion to Withdraw, it is HEREBY ORDERED THAT Jeffrey S. Pagliuca and Laura A. Menninger of Haddon, Morgan & Foreman, P.C. are granted leave to withdraw as co-counsel for defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in the above-captioned matter. Dated: August 7, 2025. Paul A. Engelmayer The Honorable Paul A. Engelmayer United States District Judge DOJ-OGR-00015130

text_blocks.content: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. GHISLAINE MAXWELL, Defendant.

Upon consideration of the Motion to Withdraw, it is HEREBY ORDERED THAT Jeffrey S. Pagliuca and Laura A. Menninger of Haddon, Morgan & Foreman, P.C. are granted leave to withdraw as co-counsel for defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in the above-captioned matter.
The Honorable Paul A. Engelmayer United States District Judge

organizations: United States District Court Southern District of New York

additional_notes: The document is a court order granting a motion to withdraw as co-counsel for the defendant Ghislaine Maxwell. The document is signed by The Honorable Paul A. Engelmayer, United States District Judge.
